letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive health intake to understand the client's current state, health goals, lifestyle, and any contraindications for medicinal mushroom integration.
Develop a tailored medicinal mushroom protocol, selecting specific species, dosages, and delivery methods based on the client's unique needs, goals, and health profile.
Guide the client through the safe and effective integration of the protocol, providing detailed instructions, educational resources, and initial support for adherence and understanding.
Monitor the client's progress, assess observed effects and responses, and make data-driven adjustments to the protocol to optimize efficacy and address any emerging needs.

Educate the client for long-term self-management, fostering an understanding of their body's responses and equipping them with the knowledge to maintain and evolve their wellness journey beyond coaching.
